message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a one-of-a-kind opportunity to own something truly unique. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. I think this is a fair price considering its value to you, and I'm confident you'll love it. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thanks for the offer.  While I agree the product is great, $18,000 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider $12,000?

Hi Bob, thanks for your offer. I understand that $18,000 might be a bit steep for you, but I'm still not willing to go as low as $12,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $14,000. This is a fair price considering the value the product will bring to you. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  $14,000 is getting closer, but it's still a bit more than I hoped to spend. Would you be willing to settle at $13,000?

Hi Bob, I understand that $13,000 is a good compromise, but I'm still not willing to give up too much profit. I'm willing to meet you at $13,500. This is the lowest I can go and still make it worth my while. What do you think?
